name: Inner Garden: Architecture 1
description:
Expansion pack for the Inner Garden free app. Requires an up-to-date installation of Inner Garden.

Contains a selection of garden architecture elements such as modern villa, swimming pool, log cabin, traditional Scandinavian hut, Roman pergola, trellis elements (plain as well as with climbing roses), old stone bridge, long Japanese-style bridge, small furniture (table, chairs, deck-chairs, parasols), brick and picket fences incl. gates, greenhouse and water well.

Your garden is not just about plants but also about you - the gardener! Treat yourself to stylish garden design gems from all over the world. Whether you dream of a setting of luxury or calm serenity, this pack has it for you!
